analysis.description:
ERC20Token (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#3-9) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#5-6)
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#6-9)

Reentrancy in UnicornRefunds.claimReward (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#85-101):
	External calls:
	- (unicornCount,visitType,state,completedCount) = ranch.getBooking(msg.sender,_bookingIndex) (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#86-87)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowedAmounts (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#95-99)
	- rewardClaimed (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#93-94)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_contracts/0x2f490751589db68f3c406bf9c14c95ec7fa26840.sol#1): it allows old versions
